comments:
The update manager informed me that there were new updates available. I selected to view them and found that none were visible.

Deselecting "show latest version only" reveals "Apache Tuscany" and "Apache CXF", but neither appear to have any installable components.
Created an attachment (id=73012)
my eclipse configuration

Created an attachment (id=73013)
Screenshot of update manager with no available updates

Created an attachment (id=73014)
Screenshot of Tuscany and CXF with no available packages

I've noticed I see this error when attempting to search for updates:

eclipse.buildId=I20070625-1500
java.version=1.6.0_02
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=gtk, NL=en_GB
Command-line arguments:  -os linux -ws gtk -arch x86

Error
Wed Aug 08 14:24:14 BST 2007
Error processing update site mirror. [The element type "img" must be terminated by the matching end-tag "</img>".]
